entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix VB Parsing of Format Specifiers #58043
    Backlog
  • 'Add parameter' should respect wrapping of existing parameters. #58040
  • Applying EditorBrowsable attribute to property getters or setters does not work #58039
    Backlog
  • Runtime crash due to assigning a null value to a non-nullable reference using null-forgiving operator and using the null reference #58033
  • Code completion doesn't adhere to indentation settings #58032
  • ExpressionCompiler.UnitTests are not run in CI #58030
  • Useless fix is suggested to `CS0612: XXX is obsolete` when the obsolete thing is a part of the Attribute for fields/props #58028
  • Assembly warning flag #58026
  • Null string array passed to InterpolatedStringHandlerArgument crashes compiler and IDE analyzers #58025

Closed

  • Support more than "Diagnostic" for faults (NFE/NFW) #58027
  • [Complete] Require .NET 6 GA SDK for Roslyn development #57638
  • [Proposal]: Support "raw" string literals #2239
  • roslyn Code generators having issues when using external dependencies,. ex: Newtonsoft.Json #56216
    17.1
  • Compiler can't load an analyzer where a binding redirect may be needed #53672
    17.1
  • Test plan for CallerArgumentExpressionAttribute #52745
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix await completion for expression body lambda #58042
    Area-IDE
  • Snap 17.1 P2 #58041
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Log runtime framework of remote host #58038
    Area-IDE
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Factor nullability logic for placeholders #58036
    Area-Compilers
  • Port "Fix race condition in computing _hostAnalyzerStateMap" for 16.11 servicing #58034
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix removal and addition of analyzer in same batch #58024
    Area-IDE
  • Extract Method: top level method that is static should create a static extraction #58021
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Skip flaky test Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.UnitTests.Semantics.BinaryOperators.TestLargeStringConcatenation #58035
    Area-Compilers, 17.1.P2
  • Enable nullable reference types for TableDataSource #58031
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P2
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58022
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.1.P2
  • Fix typo in XML doc for GeneratorExtensions #58020
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1.P2
  • Add Roslyn.VisualStudio.Setup as a build dependency for integration tests #58018
    Area-Infrastructure, 17.1.P2
  • Hold Receiver directly in bound node for implicit indexer access #58009
    Area-Compilers, 17.1.P2
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.1.P2
  • Simplify 'interpolation' data, and move to an easier to consume System.Range approach for it #57966
    Area-Compilers, 17.1.P2
  • [LSP] Switch to exclusively using semantic tokens range handling #57959
    Area-IDE, LSP, 17.1.P2
  • Share '@'-sign logic with the normal lexer and the interpolated string scanner. #57946
    Area-Compilers, 17.1.P2
  • Attempt to mark EqualityContract property accessor as not auto-implemented #57917
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records, 17.1.P2
  • Add missing test for CallerArgumentExpression #57805
    Area-Compilers, 17.1.P2

Updated

  • [17.1 P2 snap] Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58045
    Area-Infrastructure, Needs UX Triage
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58044
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Read SourceLink info and call service to retrieve source from there #57978
    Area-IDE
  • Add VS integration test pipeline #57953
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Shorten paths in VS installation #57726
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update to DiffPlex 1.5.0 #58016
    Area-Compilers
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Report a level 7 warning for lower-cased type names #56905
    Area-Compilers
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add feature to convert to file-scoped namespace just by typing `;` after a normal namespace. #58003
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.7-vs-deps #57504
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [SourceLink] Create output window for logging, and tell the user what is going on #57996
    Area-IDE
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.9-vs-deps #57508
    Area-Infrastructure
  • draft #57915
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add test from PR 50799 for impl PR 56853 #57752
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE
  • Pass AnalysisKind instead of int #58017
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add nullability annotation to CopyAnnotationsTo() #57992
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix placement of trivia inside an interpolation #57989
    Area-Compilers
  • Do less work during CI checkout #57960
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
